page.title: 02THE CIVIC SOCIETY
page.content: In Kirkburton there is a Civic Society and we interviewed a member of it called Mr.C.Prior.The Civic Society is a group of people who are involved in what the village looks like,they don't want anything to happen to it like building extra houses when greenland or trees could be planted.The Civic Society plays an important part in the planning of Kirkburton like making room for factories,car parks or parks.In Kirkburton there is going to be a Country Park.We asked him what he wanted the Country Park to look like. He said it would have grassland,trees, bushes and footpaths by the river.It will be about half a mile long and not very wide.The Civic Society had the idea to build the Country Park because there was nowhere for the villagers to go to have peace and quiet away from the roads.
